tool_description: Display the most latest news in the world about climat crisis
name: Climat change API
title: Climat change API

api_list.name: getSpecifics media id
api_list.description: display the news by media ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climat-change-api.p.rapidapi.com/news/theGuardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climat-change-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
